  • 方法详细资料

    • fromTxt

      public static Maze fromTxt​(java.lang.String filename) throws InvalidMazeException
      Factory for constructing Maze from text file.
      参数:
      filename - The path of the txt file
      返回:
      Maze a maze object
      抛出:
      InvalidMazeException - will raise an exception if the input file has problem

    • getAdjacentTile

      public Tile getAdjacentTile​(Tile t, Maze.Direction d)
      Given a tile t and direction d, return the neighbouring tile
      参数:
      t - tile
      d - direction
      返回:
      the neighbouring tile or null if out of the boundary of the map

    • getEntrance

      public Tile getEntrance()
      返回:
      tile of the entrance

    • getExit

      public Tile getExit()
      返回:
      tile of the exit

    • getTileAtLocation

      public Tile getTileAtLocation​(Maze.Coordinate cor)
      参数:
      cor - the coordinate of a tile
      返回:
      the tile of the coordinate

    • getTileLocation

      public Maze.Coordinate getTileLocation​(Tile t)
      参数:
      t - the tile to be looking for
      返回:
      the coordinate of the tile

    • getTiles

      public java.util.List<java.util.List<Tile>> getTiles()
      返回:
      2d list of tiles

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      返回:
      the width of the map

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      返回:
      the height of the map

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Convert the map to printable string
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
